name: places/ChIJJUy4zExZwokR-NvIAm5K3nU
adrFormatAddress: 432 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Edona helped transform my hair from a brassy mess to a beautiful cool tone blended balayage. She is a complete master and I highly recommend her if you’re looking to add some dimension or correct your hair. I told I wanted to remain brunette overall and keep it healthy - she did just that. Highly recommend this salon!

text.text: Edona helped transform my hair from a brassy mess to a beautiful cool tone blended balayage. She is a complete master and I highly recommend her if you’re looking to add some dimension or correct your hair. I told I wanted to remain brunette overall and keep it healthy - she did just that. Highly recommend this salon!

originalText.text: Kindest, caring, educated, artist in the business.  I’ve been seeing Mustafa since 2019, and when I moved to Italy earlier this year I was scared to let anyone else touch my hair. So when I arrived to NY on Friday I went straight to Salon Lexington and had Mustafa do my balayage and cut. I’ll need to make a trip to NY at least once a year so he can do my hair. Trust me, you won’t regret it.

text.text: Kindest, caring, educated, artist in the business.  I’ve been seeing Mustafa since 2019, and when I moved to Italy earlier this year I was scared to let anyone else touch my hair. Trust me, you won’t regret it.

originalText.text: Edona…the one and only hairstylist I can trust with my hair. I first came to her after a horrible hair coloring done at another salon. She had no problem telling me she could fix it but she honestly told me we could not do what I wanted at the moment because she did not want to damage or burn my hair. She said we would take care of it and within 6 months we could achieve a better look! (1st picture is the 1st fix up) I gave myself about a year to come to her for bleaching. I had long heavy toned out color and I just needed her to work her magic. She took all day with me but never rushed any part of the process. I appreciated that because I left with the most fluffiest and healthy feeling hair even after bleach. I wanted a some type of brown, but we started off with an ashy color. It was different for me but I wanted to try something new. Im still getting used to this color but I know that if I wanted to go honey brown she would make it happen without a problem. Plan is to grow out my hair again and do long back layers. Right now, just wanted to neutralize my hair dimensions and she did just that. Honestly, Im mostly pleased and super thankful for the fact that my hair feels so healthy and nothing was rushed. I’ve definitely gave her work but she worked through it! (Final result 2nd pic) Love you girl ❤️

(Final result 2nd pic) Love you girl ❤️

originalText.text: Had the best experience here! Staff was so nice, salon was clean and spacious, and I loved my hair cut!!! Will definitely be going back. The woman who cut my hair was super helpful, asking lots of questions and making recommendations. Loved it!

text.text: Had the best experience here! Staff was so nice, salon was clean and spacious, and I loved my hair cut!!! Will definitely be going back. The woman who cut my hair was super helpful, asking lots of questions and making recommendations. Loved it!

originalText.text: I’ve been coming to Mustafa for years. I’ve taken a hair class with him as well and was able to learn so much from him. He is truly one of a kind artist. He’s a master of color, balayage, and cuts! He pays attention to each detail and makes sure that you leave with absolute perfection! He is such a wonderful and humble person. You can trust that you are in good hands! His #1 priority is to not only to make the hair look amazing but he goes above and beyond to make it so healthy. My hair is super long, thick and hard to manage but he makes it look effortless. I don’t trust anyone with my hair but him!
